citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50am on
08-DEC-16.
The inspector was able to make contact with a gentleman at the facility. He confirmed that no one was available for
inspection at that time.
